EmailTemplate.name: 201901_Global_Email_GoDirectAirlines_Webcast_TM.201901_Global_Email_GoDirectAirl
EmailTemplate.subject: Webcast – Say Goodbye to Digital Department Silos and Data Confusion with GoDirect™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Does your airline struggle to break down digital silos or analytics while engaging the various departments that play a role in that? Do you have an integrated solution to get pre, mid and post flight data to your team when and where they need it, real-time and organized for everyone to see and share?
Join our webcast on February 1 at 7:30 a.m. PT / 10:30 a.m. ET to learn how to leverage tools from Honeywell GoDirect™ to drive higher profits, enable maximum savings, increase productivity and unify multiple internal and external stakeholders. We’ll show you how we break down data silos by integrating and distributing actionable insights that are relevant to each one of your departments, in a simple and easily actionable way. You won't want to miss this!
Check out our webcast How to Engage each Department to Reach your Profit Goals to see for yourself.
REGISTER NOW <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_11uo3bn5TuC4RKgGQmRkGg]]>
